description: This men’s Merino wool shirt is bringing the style. Its regular, movement-friendly cut and chafe-reducing seams offer comfort, while its eco-conscious plant-based dye creates an intriguing and one-of-a-kind look. But that’s not all—this tee also brings ZQ-certified Merino wool softness, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. When you want to look good and feel good too, our Men’s Merino 150 Plant-Based-Dye Baselayer Short Sleeve tee is a wardrobe must-have.
name: Smartwool Classic All-Season (150) Plant-Based Dye Merino Base Layer LS - Mens
